injurymatrix 0.1.0
  • Reference

Find records with valid external causes of injury icd-10-cm.

Source: R/utils.R
matrix_valid_external.Rd

Find records with valid external causes of injury icd-10-cm.

matrix_valid_external(data, diag_ecode_col)

Arguments

data

input data
diag_ecode_col

column indices

Value

valid_external, a binary variable indicating whether the record has (value = 1) a valid external cause of injury icd-10-cm code

Examples


library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
set.seed(5)
icd10cm_data150 %>%
matrix_valid_external(diag_ecode_col = c(2:6)) %>%
sample_n(10)

#> # A tibble: 10 x 7
#>    uid   diagnosis_1 diagnosis_2 diagnosis_3 ecode1  ecode2 valid_external
